title: Week 6 Picks, Big Spreads, Are Falcons Looking Ahead To Patriots? (Football 10/13)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora have you covered with their Week 6 gambling picks against the spread, and the episode even starts with a baseball bet (1:09). Football wagers start with big lines in Browns-Texans (9:59), Pats-Jets (13:56), and Dolphins-Falcons (19:43). The guys continue to give their thoughts on Lions-Saints (24:07), Packers-Vikings (26:48), 49ers-Redskins (36:06) and Steelers-Chiefs (47:05). The podcast concludes with Nick, Will, Pete and Jason's best bets (1:01:14).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Nick, Will, Pete and Jason give their picks against the spread for every game in Week 6 of the NFL.
